Headline: Green Line Service Delayed at Cicero
ShortDescription: Green Line trains are standing at Cicero due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line trains are standing at Cicero due to police activity.

Shuttle buses have been requested to provide connecting service from Harlem/Lake to Ashland/Lake. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
